title: Wewlad hows this fair?
body:
-Be me
-Be supporting
-Landing 90% of my knockups
-Get camped by enemy jungler
-Our jg cries about enemy jgler ganking
-Our jg proceeds to afk farm rest of game
-Enemy mid camping bot too
-Ally mid afks and rage quits the game because "MUH LANEZ COONTROOL COONT BE DOON"
-Top just inting for the lulz
-ADC only decent player
-ADC proceeds to afk because 2 others afk'd 
-Be me
-Knocking up still tryna win
-Lose
-Gets demoted

I get demoted because of 2 afks, and inter, and a troll jg?
okay riot?

replies.body: idk if ur trolling with this post or not. if you arent a certain rank its for 2 reasons: either a) u dont play enough or b) u arent good enough. its 2020 lets not have the same discussions every year
Can't tell if bait, or just trying to sound like an Iron player.
ok how do elo boosters get accounts from iron to diamond in under a week ?

AH
You were baiting, that explains it.
